languages.text: "Ищущие милостей, а не испытаний, оскорбляют Неумирающего — это истина".
"To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."
languages.original_text: "Ищущие милостей, а не испытаний, оскорбляют Неумирающего — это истина".

traits.locale_text: "To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One; such is the truth."
"To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One; such is the truth."
"To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."
"To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."

languages.text: 「試練より祝福をねだるなんて、不滅の者への侮辱だ。それが真実だ」
languages.original_text: "To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「試練より祝福をねだるなんて、不滅の者への侮辱だ。それが真実だ」

languages.text: «Suplicar bendiciones en lugar de ordalías supone una afrenta al Inmortal; tal es la verdad».
languages.original_text: "To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Suplicar bendiciones en lugar de ordalías supone una afrenta al Inmortal; tal es la verdad».

languages.text: “祈求赐福，却不祈求试炼，这等同于在侮辱不死之神。真相正是如此。”
languages.original_text: "To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."

traits.locale_text: “祈求赐福，却不祈求试炼，这等同于在侮辱不死之神。真相正是如此。”

languages.text: "Das Erflehen von Segnungen ist eine Beleidigung des Todlosen ... das ist die Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Das Erflehen von Segnungen ist eine Beleidigung des Todlosen ... das ist die Wahrheit."

languages.text: « Implorer une bénédiction plutôt que supporter une épreuve, c'est une insulte envers l'Immortel. C'est la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Implorer une bénédiction plutôt que supporter une épreuve, c'est une insulte envers l'Immortel. C'est la vérité. »

languages.text: "Sınav yerine lütuf için yalvarmak, Ölmeyen'e hakarettir. Hakikat budur."
languages.original_text: "To beg for blessings rather than trials is an insult to the Undying One — such is the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Sınav yerine lütuf için yalvarmak, Ölmeyen'e hakarettir. Hakikat budur."
